sentences.en: A gimmicky or imbalanced team relies on one powerful tactic to win.
sentences.cn: 投机取巧的团队依靠单一的强力战术制胜.

sentences.en: a tactic employed to speed up the peace process
sentences.cn: 为加速和平进程而采取的策略

sentences.en: Anyone who has done laundry has intuitively used this tactic.
sentences.cn: 在洗衣店工作过的任何人都会凭直觉来采用这一策略.

sentences.en: Do your intelligence officers know where the bad guys are planning to use this leapfrog tactic?
sentences.cn: 你们情报官员知道那帮坏蛋打算在哪里实施这些跳蛙策略?

sentences.en: I used every weapon and tactic I could think of.
sentences.cn: 我用了我能想到的每一种武器和战术。

sentences.en: It's a well-tried tactic to play down public expectations in advance of a superpower summit.
sentences.cn: 在超级大国的峰会之前降低公众的期望值是个屡试不爽的策略。

sentences.en: Only you may find that this tactic also delivers some undesirable side - effects.
sentences.cn: 只不过你可能会发现,这种策略也会带来一些不受欢迎的副作用.

sentences.en: Orcas need to be used aggressively for this tactic to succeed.
sentences.cn: 为了这种战术得成功,需要进攻性得使用奥卡.

sentences.en: Over the next few months, however, that tactic will be difficult to sustain.
sentences.cn: 然而在接下去的几个月这个策略将很难维持下去。

sentences.en: Republicans accuse Democrats of using delaying tactics (= something you do in order to give yourself more time ) to prevent a final vote on the bill.
sentences.cn: 共和党指责民主党采取拖延战术来阻止议案的最终票决。

sentences.en: Shock tactics are being used in an attempt to stop drink drivers.
sentences.cn: 正在采取“震慑策略”来制止司机酒后驾车。

sentences.en: That is not a Right tactic but a '' Left " one.
sentences.cn: 不是右,而是 “ 左 ”.

sentences.en: The anti - monopoly laws is the main tactic to restrict the Administrative monopoly.
sentences.cn: 制定反垄断法,是制止行政垄断的基础.

sentences.en: The blitz was the most common tactic of German fascists during WWII.
sentences.cn: “闪电战”是二战时德国的法西斯军队最常用的战术之一.

sentences.en: The findings give scientific support to a long weight - control tactic.
sentences.cn: 这一发现为“细嚼慢咽有助减肥”的老生常谈提供了科学依据.

sentences.en: The new tactic was put into operation early in 1939.
sentences.cn: 这个新的战略是在1939年初开始运用的.

sentences.en: The rebels would still be able to use guerrilla tactics to make the country ungovernable.
sentences.cn: 反叛者仍然可以用游击战术使国家难以统治。

sentences.en: The team won the game thanks to Jeff's fabulous spot tactic.
sentences.cn: 多亏了杰夫当场制定的英明战略,他的球队赢了.

sentences.en: They used this kind of scare tactic when I was growing up.
sentences.cn: 我小的时候,他们用过这种吓唬人的办法.

sentences.en: This tactic is especially good if the fuels are locally produced.
sentences.cn: 要是这些燃料在地方上生产出来,这一策略尤其精辟.

sentences.en: This was a tactic neutralized by the a Jiralhanae frigate pair.
sentences.cn: 这是双护卫舰通常采取的标准压制战术.

sentences.en: You have probably heard of this tactic before.
sentences.cn: 你以前也可能听说过这个策略。

words.tran_cn: 战术的；策略的；善于策略的

trans.tran_en: a method that you use to achieve something
